github.description: Official GitHub MCP server for repository management, issues, PRs

sqlite.description: Official SQLite MCP server for database operations

filesystem.description: Official filesystem server for file operations in project directory

fetch.description: Official fetch server for web scraping and API calls

time.description: Time and date utilities with timezone conversion for match scheduling

whatsapp.description: WhatsApp Business Platform integration for bet input parsing

interactive.description: Interactive LLM workflows for admin efficiency and user prompts

Data Integration Agent.purpose: Database operations for scraped data, web scraping for match results, file management for CSV data, time handling for match scheduling

Betting System API Agent.purpose: Database operations for bets and league table, WhatsApp integration for bet input, time utilities for scheduling, optional web API calls

Betting Club UI Agent.purpose: WhatsApp message parsing tools, interactive workflows for admin interface, file operations for frontend assets, optional API calls for data fetching

Integration Testing Agent.purpose: API testing and validation, interactive testing workflows, GitHub integration for CI/CD, database and file validation

System Integration Agent.purpose: Version control and deployment, file system operations, database management, web service health checks

warpInstallationInstructions.step1: Configure MCP servers in Warp Agent Mode settings
warpInstallationInstructions.step2: Go to Warp Settings > AI > Agents > MCP Servers
warpInstallationInstructions.step3: Add each MCP server configuration individually
warpInstallationInstructions.step4: Set environment variables in your shell profile or Warp agent settings:

environmentVariables.GITHUB_PERSONAL_ACCESS_TOKEN: Get from GitHub Settings > Developer settings > Personal access tokens
environmentVariables.YCLOUD_API_KEY: Get from YCloud dashboard for WhatsApp integration (optional)

warpInstallationInstructions.step5: Assign specific MCP servers to each agent profile in agent permissions
warpInstallationInstructions.step6: Test MCP server connectivity in each agent pane

selectedServers.github: Essential for version control, issue tracking, and CI/CD integration
selectedServers.sqlite: Perfect for betting club database - lightweight, local, no auth required
selectedServers.filesystem: Needed for CSV data management, frontend assets, and file operations
selectedServers.fetch: Critical for web scraping match results and API integrations
selectedServers.time: Essential for match scheduling, timezone handling, and betting deadlines
selectedServers.whatsapp: Key requirement for admin efficiency - parsing bets from WhatsApp messages
selectedServers.interactive: Enables efficient admin workflows and user interaction patterns

rejectedServers.reason: Avoided complex database servers (PostgreSQL, MySQL), cloud services requiring authentication, specialized tools not relevant to betting club functionality, and servers that duplicate existing capabilities
